official_title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to increase the number of members of the board of directors of the Tennessee Valley Authority from three to seven.

summary.text: Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to increase the number of members of the board of directors of the Tennessee Valley Authority to seven. Sets forth procedures for the appointment of such new members. Increases the number of members required for a quorum to four.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to increase the number of members of the board of directors of the Tennessee Valley Authority from three to seven.
